item.title: Pride: First Gen
item.description: Proud First Gen Student I will be graduating this may with a BSA in biology as a first generation student! Below I will be using the reticulate package to code in both R and python. library(reticulate) This_year_was_awful <- "I am a" Senior_year_was <- "I am so very greatful to" I_cannot_believe_I_surived = "proud first generation student!" absolutely_insane = "all my friends and family who helped me along the way!" print(r.This_year_was_awful, I_cannot_believe_I_surived) ## I am a proud first generation student!
